title: Network Engineer
companyName: Intellectual Capital Hr Consulting Pvt Ltd
tagsAndSkills: Network Operations,Network Engineering,Wireshark,Network Configuration,support environment,Network Devices,networking protocols,Network Support

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
• Have good understanding of Trading Infra
  • Good Knowledge of Exchanges NSE, NSE Colo and BSE Colo IT related
  • Ensure the infrastructure team is mitigating, monitoring and managing infrastructure related risks
  • Thorough knowledge of various operating systems, Windows, Linux, Ubuntu and network infra.
  • Managing technology infrastructure and assets at across locations and coordinate with team to maintain and support company's technology hardware and software.
  • Leading efforts to research and pilot new technology to improve Infrastructure service
  • Assisting in analyzing processes and process changes for greater efficiency.
  • Good knowledge of managing Servers Infra
  • Oversee/ Install the physical deployment of switches and servers in the NSE (National Stock Exchange) COLO (colocation) racks.
  • Cabling to Connect COLO Switches with NSE COLO Trading Platform:
  • Oversee the cabling process to connect COLO switches with the NSE COLO trading platform.
  • Ensure proper cable management and organization to minimize interference and maximize efficiency.
  • Test connectivity to ensure seamless data transmission between switches and the trading platform.
  • Configuration of COLO switches to integrate with NSE COLO Trading platform:
  • Installation of operating systems, Windows, Linux, Ubuntu

Skills & Competencies:-:


  • Understanding of the OSI or TCP/IP model
  • Deep understanding on IP Subnetting
  • Understanding of LAN, WAN terminology, IP packet flow & DHCP packet flow.
  • Knowledge of Static and dynamic routing and Switching Protocols
  • Good Knowledge and work experience of networking protocols (e.g., IPSEC, HSRP, BGP, OSPF,)
  • Good Knowledge and work experience on Multicast and PIM and Implement Multicast and PIM network configurations
  • Understanding of TCP/UDP ports and network tools like Wireshark.
  • Must have experience in network operations/support environment.
  • Hands-on experience on network devices i.e. Cisco router and switches and fortinet, paloalto firewall
hiringFor: Intellectual Capital HR Consulting Pvt Ltd

title: Manufacturing Process  Engineer
companyName: Intellectual Capital Hr Consulting Pvt Ltd
tagsAndSkills: Manufacturing Engineering,Process  Engineer,Lean,Jigs & Fixture,Digital Platform,Continuous Improvement,IioT,Flow Charts
jobDescription:
US MNC : Manufacturing Process Engineer @ Mumbai


Our client offers miniature motor technologies to solve the motion needs of a

spectrum of end markets, from medical devices to various industrial applications that save,

improve, & enhance lives. We serve our customers through breadth of innovative product

technologies to optimize application performance.

They are part of the Large US Group , which is a leading, global manufacturer of

airflow, motion control, power transmission & power generation solutions used in commercial,

industrial, & residential settings. Current headcount exceeds 29,000 associates


  • Department : Manufacturing
  • Reports to: Advance Manufacturing Manager

Position Summary:

  • Handled turnkey projects start from Laying the Layout, Set-Up Of Equipment's & Productionize to hand over.
  • Responsible for the delivery of Advanced Engineered Solutions by developing Jigs & Fixture, Low-Cost Automation & working on Continuous Improvement Tools for improving the Safety, Quality, Cost & Productivity using Lean Tools & Six Sigma tools.
  • Identify the supplier, estimate the cost & make the Techno commercial proposal to management for approval.
  • Responsible for trialing out the process with proper qualification & by updating the process documentation (like SOP, Setting procedure, etc.)
  • Will collaborate with stakeholders such as manufacturing, maintenance & quality for smooth Handover by providing training.
  • Monitor & reporting monthly/Quarterly/Half yearly to finance regarding overall CAPEX (Budget Vs Actual).
  • Implementation of Ind 4.0 regarding M2M connectivity using IoT & Integrate with Software to Provide a Digital platform for Manufacturing.

Education & Experience:

  • Bachelors Degree in Mechanical/ Production /Mechatronics/ Electrical Engineering with 4+ years of work experience

Essential Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for working with Stakeholder for understanding the requirement for developing a new equipment Set-up a New Line Upgrading of existing line/Equipment.
  • Responsible for understanding Customer Requirement & translate into Technical Specification by considering the product & Process characteristic, Safety, ergonomics, Poka-yoke & others etc.,
  • Create & development concept drawing of making New Assembly Lines / Special Purpose Machines / Jigs & Fixtures- Tooling & Other Test benches development.
  • Responsible for discussing the concept with stakeholders, getting mutual understanding & getting initial buy for making the proposal.
  • Responsible for implementing Manufacturing Flow Charts, Standard Work, procedures, Control Plans & FMEAs as prescribed by ISO standards & Business system. (For New Line/Existing line)
  • Responsible for Sending an enquiry to different supplier to get quotes, make the techno commercial comparison & evaluate in terms of Function, Performance & Cost aspects.
  • Responsible for Raising the Capex by making the Budgetary Proposal along with justification for Management approval.
  • Co-ordinate & ensure for release Purchase order to supplier on time.
  • Responsible for qualification of the tools equipment or Line / Layout mapping etc. at both suppliers' end plant end as well.
  • Responsible for Making documentation such as SOP | WI | Manuals etc.
  • Responsible for providing training to the operator & other stakeholders from Manufacturing / Maintenance / Quality.
  • Responsible for Troubleshooting in Process Equipment & tools by using the Problem-Solving techniques.
  • Responsible & ensure to make a report regarding the Performance of the Process Equipment Tools | Assembly Line etc. in terms of OEE
  • Responsible to hand over & sign off process equipment Tools , Assembly line to concern stakeholder for the smooth transition from Projects to Manufacturing.
  • Experience working in a team environment under time & resource pressures.
  • Responsible in Mapping Ind 4.0 requirement for connecting Machine to Machine using IoT device & Integrate with Equipment
  • Weekly & Monthly report out of Project status

Functional Competencies:

  • Ability to conceptualize, design & develop SPM with Low-Cost Automation.
  • Ability to conceptualize, design & development of efficient Jigs, Fixtures preferably with automation as feasible ( Assembly tools | Spot Welding / Laser welding etc)
  • Thorough understanding of GD&T, Tolerance stack-up, Engineering Material properties, DFM concepts, Ergonomics & Poka-Yokes while proposing any change in the manufacturing set-up as well as designing new manufacturing lines.
  • Hands on experience of Process planning, Execution, Line balancing, Capacity Planning & Production Ramp- by using Gnatt Chart/MS Projects
  • Hands on experience in Welding Technology like Resistance | Plasma | Laser, in terms of electrode selection, parameter setting & optimization.
  • Hands on experience in design of Pneumatic Circuits & selecting of Pneumatic products based on the application. etc.
  • Exposure on PLC like defining I/Ps & O/Ps & Sequence.
  • Hands on experience in selecting the PLC, develop programming & execute the program with the application (Added Advantage)
  • Exposure in problems solving technique such as by implementing SPC, poka-yoke & other problem-solving tools (e.g. Six Sigma)
  • Hands on experience on making Part drawings| Assembly drawing| details drawing using software such as AutoCAD|3D Modelling such as Solid works/Creo .etc
  • Knowledge & experience working on MS Office & MS Projects.
  • Knowledge & Experience working on Ind. 4.0

Software Experience:

  • 3D Modeling software - Creo SolidWorks.
  • 2D Drafting AutoCAD.
  • Pneumatic Design of Pneumatic Circuit in Fluid draw, SMC pneudraw etc.
  • PLC Ladder Diagram Mitusubshi, OMRON, Delta etc.
  • Lean Tools- Line Balancing, VSM, SMED & OEE etc.
  • Six Sigma tools- (Preferred Knowledge on DOE, Anova, Process Capability, Gage R &R)
  • MS- Projects- Project Management
  • MS-Office Skills : Word, Excel, & PowerPoint

Key Relationships:

  • Internal: Manufacturing, Quality, R&D, Purchase, PT2 team, Direct labor
  • External: Tooling suppliers

Personal Trait/Profile:

  • Ability to apply engineering & scientific principles & disciplines like Problem Analysis & Root
  • Cause Corrective Action; Statistical Process Control; Design of Experiments; Process Validation,
  • Facilities Layout & Process Design.
  • Ability to work in a collaborative team environment & be responsive to production's needs.

Language Skills: Fluency in oral & written English communication.


You are requested E Mail updated resume with following details

  • Current Location
  • Pl. Confirm you are ready to work in Andheri , Mumbai
  • Relevant experience in Manufacturing Process Engineering (in years)
  • Can you handle turnkey project start from Laying the Layout, Set-Up Of Equipment & Productionize to hand over?
  • Are you conversant in delivery of Advanced Engineered Solutions by developing Jigs & Fixture, Low-Cost Automation & Continuous Improvement Tools using Lean Tools & Six Sigma tools.
  • Do you understand the requirement for developing a new equipment Set-up a New Line Upgrading Capex by making the Budgetary Proposal?
  • Can you Monitor & MIS regarding overall CAPEX (Budget Vs Actual).
  • Can you Implement Ind 4.0 , M2M connectivity using IoT & Integrate with Software to Provide a Digital platform for Manufacturing?
  • Can you Identify the supplier, estimate the cost & make the Techno commercial proposal for approval.
  • Can you trial out the process with proper qualification & update the process documentation (like SOP, Setting procedure, etc.)
  • Can you understand Customer Requirement & translate into Technical Specification by considering the product & Process ?
  • Can you develop a concept drawing of making New Assembly Lines / Special Purpose Machines / Jigs & Fixtures- Tooling & Other Test benches.
  • Can you implement Manufacturing Flow Charts, Standard Work, procedures, Control Plans & FMEAs as per ISO standards & Business system?
  • Can you Trouble Shooting in Process Equipment & tools by using the Problem-Solving techniques?
  • Can you create MIS , for Performance of the Process Equipment Tools | Assembly Line etc. in terms of OEE ?
  • Can you Map Ind 4.0 requirement for connecting Machine to Machine using IoT device & Integrate with Equipment ?
  • Languages Known :
  • Current Salary (Fixed +Variable)
  • Expected Salary
  • Age & Birth date
  • Minimum period required for Joining
  • Contact Details, Residence & Mobile No.
  • Skype ID / WhatsApp No.

In case you are not interested, we would appreciate, if you can refer us, suitable matching profiles from your rich contacts.

title: Sr. Geophysicist
companyName: Fugro
tagsAndSkills: Housekeeping,QC,Manager Quality Assurance,Test reporting,Data processing,Project planning,Data quality,Manager Quality Control

ambitionBoxData.Title: Fugro Survey India Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
1. Survey Planning - To plan for geophysical data acquisition as per scope, specification and schedule for survey.
2. Survey Quality Assurance - Follow appropriate work Instruction for geophysical data acquisition.
3. Pre-Mob checks - To check all geophysical survey equipment and GLOG / GPLOT data logging and Interpretation systems in FSINPVT workshop, prior to mobilisation on the survey vessel / site.
4. Mobilisation - To actively participate in installation, interfacing, setting to work and configuration of all survey equipment and systems, and undertake their calibration / verification on the field.
5. Deployment of Survey Equipment: To acquire adequate knowledge and skills in effective deployment of geophysical Survey equipment, Systems and data interpretation techniques, for meeting the objectives of the Survey work.
6. Online Quality Control of the Geophysical Data Acquired: - Ensure the quality and adequacy of the data acquired to enable further interpretation and Reporting, and finally meeting the objectives of the survey work. Order re-runs if data quality is not adequate.
7. Data Back ups / Archival :To ensure geophysical data is acquired as per approved survey procedures and duly annotate, backup and archive the same regularly in the field.
8. Data Processing to Reporting: To carryout detailed interpretation of geophysical data in the field, and prepare preliminary field reports and final reports for clients.
9. QC of charts / Drawings: Carryout QC of all the geophysical data / results of interpretations as plotted on charts / drawings accompanying the Report on Survey.
10. Soil sampling: To acquire drop-core / vibro-core samples of sea-bed, carryout onfield analysis of the samples, preparation of soil sample log sheet, proper sealing of samples and QC of lab-test reports received.
11. Any other work as assigned by the Company

title: UCCE L3 Support
companyName: Servion
tagsAndSkills: ICM,Cube,Ucce,CVP,Call Manager,Pcce,Voice Gateways,CUCM

ambitionBoxData.Title: Servion Global Solutions Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are currently hiring for UCCE L3 Support location - Mumbai ( Work from office) shift 24/7 rotational, interested candidates can share your cv to yuvashri.s@servion.com

Provide Level 3 support for Cisco (UCCE) solutions, including CVP, CUCM, Call Manager, Voice Gateways, and ICM.


Please share this job post to all your connections people who are looking for a change it will be more useful to others.


Roles and Responsibilities

UCCE L3 Support 8-12 Years Supporting Experience on Cisco UCCE / UCCX / PCCE solutions & 3rd party Call recording platforms.

  • Basic Cisco ICM/CCMP/CVP/CUIC & troubleshooting.
  • MACD creation knowledge in Cisco UCCE & IPT platforms.
  • Have clear understanding on VOIP protocols like SIP, H.323 and MGCP. Should be aware of
    ITIL process.
  • Have clear understanding of Cisco Voice network deployment models and should
    understand functioning of voice network devices.
  • Knowledge and use of VOIP and Performance Management Tools and integration
    experience with other Tools
  • Have clear understanding on Telecom infrastructure protocols like ISDN and analogy
    signalling.
  • Should be ready to work in 24/7 business support environment
  • Should be having 8-12 years of experience on Cisco Voice platform.
  • Should be having work experience on CUCM/UCCE/UCCH/CVP platforms
  • Should have strong verbal & written communication skills
  • Work & Coordinate with Third Party Providers to assist in Problem resolution of
    telecommunication Problems & OEMs for incident resolution.
  • Performs advanced remote/on site troubleshooting activities encompassing system
    design issues, upgrade plans, creation of technical product documentation, up gradation &
    site coordination.
  • Act as a point of contact for all service delivery issues/ pending work/ escalations
  • Provide team support and process improvements through individual contributions
  • Maintain and Update Knowledge Base and documentation & Initiate and implement
    processes improvements.
  • Excellent communication and conversation skills (Verbal and Written), Strong analytical and
    problem solving skills. UCCE or PCCE Email & Voice communication skills & teamwork.
    Power point presenation/preparation and should be good in excel related Analytics.
